name: netatmo-energy-adapter
description: Netatmo Energy Adapter for WebThings Gateway
author: Michael Kohler <me@michaelkohler.info>

scripts.build: shasum --algorithm 256 manifest.json package.json src/*.js src/views/* LICENSE README.md > SHA256SUMS && find node_modules \( -type f -o -type l \) -exec shasum --algorithm 256 {} \; >> SHA256SUMS
